author: markt
msg: Various DIGEST improvements ported from Tomcat 7
This fixed CVE-2012-3439 Apache Tomcat DIGEST authentication weaknesses

author: markt
msg: Implement maxHeaderCount attribute on HTTP Connectors. It is equivalent of LimitRequestFields directive of Apache HTTPD

author: jukka
msg: Further NodeBuilder simplification: Make the mutator methods return the builder instance so that method calls can be chained.
Also improve and reflow the related documentation in nodestate.md.

author: jukka
msg: OAK-352: Oak builder for simplified repository construction
First draft, along with improvements to the composite plugin classes
